page.title: 16The Rector
page.content: The present Rector is Canon Hughie Jones.His job is a busy one.He has 4 churches to visit and 6 villages.He visits people in hospital and at home. He studies,teaches,prays,writes the church magazine and attends meetings. The Bishop invited him to be Rector of the Langtons.To be a canon is an honour that the Bishop gives.There are 21 canons in Leicestershire out of about 200 clergymen.The Rector keeps bees,enjoys DIY,gardening and reading. He likes his job very much. He has been Rector here for 4 years.His favourite TV programmes are "Cats' Eyes", "Emmerdale Farm" and nature programmes.His favourite sports are mountaineering and rugby. Before he became Rector he was the Headmaster of Hind Leys Upper School and at one time he was a lecturer at Scraptoft College of Education.
